content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully placed on the map in these steps. The agent repeatedly attempted to supply a Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5) and craft one from available resources, but none were placed due to inventory shortages and production errors. While existing furnaces were referenced for smelting (one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron plates and another at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper plates), no new structure was actively created.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage with get_entities  
 – Using a keyword argument ('radius') led to an unexpected argument error.  
 – A subsequent call using three positional arguments produced a mismatch in expected parameters.  
  Tip: Always consult the function signature and pass parameters in the correct form.

• Lab Placement and Entity Retrieval  
 – An attempt to place a Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5) failed because no Lab was available in inventory.  
 – Iterating over lab entities resulted in a “NoneType is not iterable” error.  
  Tip: Verify inventory sufficiency and check that retrieved entity lists are not None before processing.

• Lab Crafting and Resource Chain Issues  
 – Multiple lab crafting attempts failed due to missing sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables).  
  Tip: Ensure all precursor items are producible by confirming adequate smelting outputs and crafting capacities before initiating lab production.
